templates.name: Leave Request
templates.description: Standard request for annual, emergency, or special liberty

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I request [ANNUAL/EMERGENCY/SPECIAL] leave for the period of [START DATE] to [END DATE] ([NUMBER] days).

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: [Briefly describe the purpose of leave, e.g., family vacation, personal matter, emergency circumstances].

paragraphs.subject: Contact Information
paragraphs.text: While on leave, I can be reached at [PHONE NUMBER] or [EMAIL]. My leave address will be [ADDRESS].

paragraphs.subject: Point of Contact
paragraphs.text: Point of contact for this request is the undersigned at [PHONE/EMAIL].

templates.name: Request Mast
templates.description: Formal request to speak with commanding officer

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I request mast with the Commanding Officer.

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: [Describe the matter you wish to discuss with the CO. Be specific but professional.]

paragraphs.subject: Previous Actions
paragraphs.text: [Describe any previous attempts to resolve this matter through the chain of command].

templates.name: Award Recommendation (NAM)
templates.description: Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal recommendation
templates.subj: RECOMMENDATION FOR NAVY AND MARINE CORPS ACHIEVEMENT MEDAL

paragraphs.subject: Recommendation
paragraphs.text: Per references (a) and (b), [RANK NAME] is recommended for the Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal (Gold Star in lieu of [NUMBER] Award) for meritorious service/achievement while serving as [BILLET] from [START DATE] to [END DATE].

paragraphs.subject: Justification
paragraphs.text: [Describe specific achievements, accomplishments, and impact. Use quantifiable metrics where possible. Focus on actions above and beyond normal duties.]

paragraphs.subject: Supporting Information
paragraphs.text: [Additional supporting information, such as impact on unit readiness, cost savings achieved, or recognition received].

paragraphs.subject: Point of Contact
paragraphs.text: Point of contact for this matter is the undersigned at [PHONE/EMAIL].

refs: SECNAVINST 1650.1H (Navy and Marine Corps Awards Manual)

templates.name: Letter of Appreciation
templates.description: Formal letter of appreciation for outstanding service

paragraphs.text: I would like to express my sincere appreciation for your outstanding performance and dedication while serving as [BILLET] from [START DATE] to [END DATE].
[Describe specific accomplishments and their impact on the unit/mission].
Your professionalism and commitment to excellence have made a lasting positive impact on [UNIT/ORGANIZATION]. I wish you continued success in your future endeavors.

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), request the following entry be made in the service record book of [RANK NAME]:

paragraphs.subject: Proposed Entry
paragraphs.text: "[DATE]: [TEXT OF PROPOSED PAGE 11 ENTRY]"

paragraphs.subject: Justification
paragraphs.text: [Explain why this entry is necessary and appropriate].

refs: MCO P1070.12K (Marine Corps Individual Records Administration Manual)

templates.name: Counseling (Positive)
templates.description: Documented positive counseling for outstanding performance

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: The purpose of this counseling is to formally recognize and document your outstanding performance.

paragraphs.subject: Observation
paragraphs.text: [Describe the specific positive behavior, accomplishment, or performance observed].

paragraphs.subject: Impact
paragraphs.text: [Explain the positive impact this had on the unit, mission, or Marines].

paragraphs.subject: Expectation
paragraphs.text: Your dedication and professionalism are commendable. Continue to maintain this high standard of performance.

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: The purpose of this counseling is to formally document a deficiency in your performance/conduct and establish expectations for improvement.

paragraphs.subject: Observation
paragraphs.text: [Describe the specific deficiency observed, including date, time, and circumstances].

paragraphs.subject: Standard
paragraphs.text: [Cite the applicable standard, order, or regulation that was not met].

paragraphs.subject: Impact
paragraphs.text: [Explain the negative impact this had or could have on the unit, mission, or Marines].

paragraphs.subject: Expectation
paragraphs.text: You are expected to correct this deficiency immediately. Failure to improve may result in adverse administrative or disciplinary action.

paragraphs.subject: Assistance
paragraphs.text: [Identify any assistance, resources, or training that will be provided to help the Marine improve].

templates.name: Transfer Information Sheet
templates.description: Letter providing information to transferring Marine

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: This memorandum provides information regarding your upcoming transfer to [NEW DUTY STATION].

paragraphs.subject: Checkout Procedures
paragraphs.text: You are required to complete the unit checkout sheet and obtain all required signatures prior to your departure date. Ensure all gear and equipment is turned in to the appropriate sections.

paragraphs.subject: Records
paragraphs.text: Verify your service record is complete and accurate. Any discrepancies should be reported to Admin immediately.

paragraphs.subject: Point of Contact
paragraphs.text: For questions regarding your transfer, contact the Admin section at [PHONE/EMAIL].
